name: DevLens
description: Quickly inspect page layouts and visualize element boundaries.

name: stylSpy
description: Instantly analyze and copy CSS from any web page element

name: SpeedBoost
description: optimizes browser resources usage to accelerate page loading.

name: JSONWizard
description: formats JSON data and protects JSON response in browser.

name: TabMaster Pro
description: organizes browser tabs into groups and sessions.

name: ViewportBuddy
description: simulates various screen resolutions directly within the browser.

name: Markup Notes
description: enables annotation and notes directly into web pages for collaborative debugging.

name: GridGuides
description: overlays customizable grids and alignment guides on any webpage.

name: Palette Picker
description: instantly extracts color palettes from any webpage.

name: LinkChecker
description: scans and highlights broken links in any pages.

name: DOM Snapshot
description: captures and exports DOM structures quickly.

name: ConsolePlus
description: inherits the developer console with enhanced debugging, filtering, and logging.
